text:
<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: Domain Validation Delays for New Public Certificates>
We are investigating delays in domain validations for new public certificates in the EU-WEST-1 Region.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: Validation and Issuance Delays for New Certificates>
We can confirm delays in validating domains for public certificates and delays issuing private certificates requested through ACM in the EU-WEST-1 Region. Existing certificates and previously deployed certificates are unaffected.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: Validation and Issuance Delays for New Certificates>
We have identified the root cause of delays in validating domains for public certificates and delays issuing private certificates requested through ACM in the EU-WEST-1 Region. We are beginning to see recovery and continue to work toward full resolution. Existing certificates and previously deployed certificates are unaffected.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Service is operating normally: [RESOLVED] Validation and Issuance Delays for New Certificates>
Between 5:45 AM and 1:20 PM PST we experienced delays in validating domains for public certificates and delays issuing private certificates requested through ACM in the EU-WEST-1 Region. The issue has been resolved and the service is operating normally. Existing certificates and previously deployed certificates were unaffected.
